message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
You can't have it all, Alice! I'm being generous!
You were a bit too generous last round, Bob. I'm willing to compromise!
I'm not budging, Alice. You're going to have to do better than that!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. Let's make a deal!
I'm not going to give you the majority, Alice. You're getting a pittance!
I'm not going to let you take everything, Bob. Let's find a fair middle ground!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not going to go any higher!
I'm not going to give up, Bob. I'm making one last push for a fair deal!
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm not budging now!
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm not going to give up now!
You're out of options, Alice. I'm taking the rest.
